name: Cerberus (LauraMarsoner, sakul243)
description:
This game was entirely created during the GameJam "Mini Jam Gam #9" by Koanplan and LauraMarsoner.

The goal was to create a game with the theme "Only one" and using a "Chain" as special object.

Assets

Environment Assets: PolygonDungeonRealms by syntystudios

SFX, Cerberus, Sound, Animations, UI, were created during the GameJam.
